overview: A writer tries to finish his work when during a break he sees a couple coming up to his building. After some casual encounters, he begins a romantic relationship with the woman, who ends up throwing herself out the window with him. The click of his typewriter suggests that the events could be a product of his work as a writer.

production_companies.name: Escuela de Artes de la Comunicación EAC

title: Tríptico (Purgatorio)
